abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration is allowed.

data.api_key_economy: API key sparing (update is called when IP changes - IP is checked at https://checkip.amazonaws.com/)

user.description:
With IPv64.net you can manage your domains and use various features including DynDNS updates, wildcard support and healthchecks. The service also offers an API that you can use to access its features and manage your domains.

You need an Account Update Token and an API key to access the IPv64.net API. You can use this information to manage your domains, make updates, and get more information about your account.
user.title: IPv64.net | Free DynDNS2 & Healthcheck Service

data.api_key_economy: API key sparing (update is called when IP changes - IP is checked at https://checkip.amazonaws.com/)

init.description:
Please note that it depends on your account status how many IP address updates can take place. With the free account, there are 64 requests per day.

The optimal setting is 23 minutes (24:64x60=22.5 minutes)
init.title: update time

refresh.description: The IP address will be updated, please note that 1 out of 64 tokens will be used.

economy.description: API key sparing (update is called when IP changes - IP is checked at https://checkip.amazonaws.com/)
economy.name: Economy-Modus

refresh.name: Refresh IP-Address
